operationalRequirements.name: Integration in the prison ecosystem
operationalRequirements.description: Design to minimize disruption to daily operations; no interference with communication or essential operations.

operationalRequirements.name: Integration in security infrastructure
operationalRequirements.description: Possibility to integrate with access control, CCTV, and personnel for situational awareness.

operationalRequirements.name: Sensor performances
operationalRequirements.description: Early detection and tracking of unauthorized drones in the vicinity, covering the entire perimeter.

operationalRequirements.name: Countermeasure activation
operationalRequirements.description: Automated response system for quick interception or disabling before contraband delivery.

operationalRequirements.name: Integration in airport ecosystem
operationalRequirements.description: System shall not compromise existing aviation safety measures.

operationalRequirements.name: System coverage
operationalRequirements.description: Shall cover the entire flight operations area, especially approach and transition areas.

operationalRequirements.name: System integration
operationalRequirements.description: Shall be integrated with Air Traffic Control (ATC) services.

operationalRequirements.name: Countermeasure activation
operationalRequirements.description: Countermeasures activated by specialized operators only after ATC approval.

operationalRequirements.name: System coverage
operationalRequirements.description: Focus on reactor buildings and spent fuel storage; detect UAS approaching or hovering.

operationalRequirements.name: Geofencing
operationalRequirements.description: Implement geofencing to restrict UAS movement within plant airspace.

operationalRequirements.name: Countermeasure activation
operationalRequirements.description: Integrated with power plant C2; activation requires approval from plant operators.

operationalRequirements.name: Reducing False Positives
operationalRequirements.description: Advanced algorithms to minimize disruptions to legitimate UAS activities in urban areas.

operationalRequirements.name: Emergency Response Integration
operationalRequirements.description: Integration with emergency protocols and coordination with response teams.

operationalRequirements.name: Technical expectation
operationalRequirements.description: Solution shall be completely mobile for quick manual installation in temporary locations.

operationalRequirements.name: Privacy Protection
operationalRequirements.description: Implementation of measures to safeguard the privacy of individuals around the stadium.

operationalRequirements.name: Laser Threat Detection
operationalRequirements.description: Capabilities to identify and track UAS equipped with dazzling lasers.

operationalRequirements.name: Technical expectation
operationalRequirements.description: Components installed on a VAN/truck to allow quick mobile operations in urban squares.

operationalRequirements.name: Covert Operation Capability
operationalRequirements.description: Option for covert operation to conceal presence and maintain the element of surprise.

operationalRequirements.name: Technical expectation
operationalRequirements.description: Low power consumption; must work with batteries or renewable sources.

operationalRequirements.name: Chaining Systems
operationalRequirements.description: Must allow chaining of several systems to protect linear borders over 50 km.

operationalRequirements.name: RailSAR
operationalRequirements.description: Integrate foliage penetration radar to detect threats hidden in dense vegetation.

operationalRequirements.name: Technical expectation
operationalRequirements.description: Components must be tested and certified for use in saline environments.

operationalRequirements.name: Stealth Operations
operationalRequirements.description: Provide stealth technologies and low-signature practices to avoid counter-detection.

scenarioFunctionalRequirements.description: Detect a single class C1 UAS (weight <900g).
Be immune to false alarms caused by flying birds.

Detect UAS in poor visibility/adverse weather conditions.
Distinguish UAS from general aviation (helicopters/airplanes).
Detect all UAS in strong electromagnetic interference.
Detect a single class I small UAS (<15 kg) with optical camera.
Enable UAS tracking in the dark.
Distinguish between friend or foe UAS (IFF).
Identify the load carried by the UAS.
Estimate the position of the UAS in real time as soon as detected.
Detect discharge of load based on characteristic technology features.
Alert operator that UAS is approaching facility's critical zone.
Enable operator to independently identify non-commercial UAS via prompts.
Keep logs of detected objects with operator classification (false alarm/threat).
Track all UAS in strong electromagnetic interference.
Continue tracking despite temporary loss of sight.
Detect a UAS flying autonomously.
Estimate position of UAS in real time upon detection.
Detect in a difficult environment — afforestation.
Detect discharge of a possible load based on characteristic features.
Provide observation capability regardless of sea state.
Be resistant to severe weather conditions — strong wind.
Alarm operator of malicious UAS with specified False Positive Rate (FPR).
